In England, in the seven days to 12 October, there were 232,033 new confirmed cases (410.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 October, there were 193,253 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 20% (38,780 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 October is 7,187,635 (12,710.2 cases per 100,000 population).
